Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Monica F.
Reviews.Content: the video is good, night time is also very clear. more important is the price is good.received this camera in 2 days, fast shipping.Very happy with the camera now. i mount this camera in front of my house, monitor the entrance.i would recommend this camera to my friends.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff Z.
Reviews.Content: the camera has very good video, more important is the price is super low.i'm very happy with this camera, it stays in my lobby, gives me awesome color picture at day time and super clear video at night.highly recommend it to my friends.
